name: King's Quest - Chapter 1: A Knight to Remember
name_original: King's Quest - Chapter 1: A Knight to Remember
description:
Download King’s Quest – Chapter 1: A Knight to Remember, the first part of a five-chapter game series that boldly re-imagines one of gaming’s most groundbreaking franchises. An aging King Graham reflects on a life of adventure with his granddaughter, Gwendolyn, taking players back to his teen years and his quest to become a knight of Daventry in King Edward’s royal guard. Discover a wondrous world full of whimsical characters, charming puzzles and perilous dangers in this fun and enchanting coming of age story.



Additional hardware required for Remote Play.
